bug.author: Hamid-Najafi
bug.description: Im triyng to train 64 images using coco64.txt and noticed that there is a missing label file (COCO 2017 Labels) ! 'train2017/000000459590.txt'

comments.comment: Hello @Goldenstarc, thank you for your interest in our work! Please visit our <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/wiki/Train-Custom-Data>Custom Training Tutorial</denchmark-link> to get started, and see our <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/blob/master/tutorial.ipynb>Google Colab Notebook</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://hub.docker.com/r/ultralytics/yolov3>Docker Image</denchmark-link> , and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/wiki/GCP-Quickstart>GCP Quickstart Guide</denchmark-link> for example environments. If this is a bug report, please provide screenshots and minimum viable code to reproduce your issue, otherwise we can not help you.
@Goldenstarc yes this is fine. This image has no labels, so the label file may be omitted.
This issue is stale because it has been open 30 days with no activity. Remove Stale label or comment or this will be closed in 5 days.
